txt.en: \qThe Master of the Charge\q is a legendary book detailing the dark tale of captain who called forth Oathbreakers to fulfil their vow and aid him in a great battle.

You have heard it whispered that the libraries of Moria yet contain many tomes, while many other volumes were brought by the dwarves seeking to reclaim their ancient home. One such tome in the libraries of the Iron Garrison is said to be the legendary \qThe Master of the Charge.\q If you can gain enough favour with the Iron Garrison Guards, they may let you have their copy of this book.
Read the book, \qThe Master of the Charge\q
